name: Bahia - Maduro - Corona Gigante
additionalNotes: If you’re in search of a sultry handmade that hails from Nicaragua and delivers a smooth, earthy punch courtesy of a rich Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper, then Bahia Maduro deserves to go in the cart! Flavors of coffee, earth and leather with a sweet spice stay on point from start to finish. The medium to full-bodied profile is certain to appeal to a broad range of Broadleaf fanatics and the uber-palatable price makes trying a bundle of Bahia Maduro a tasty proposition.
